topic: Eurographics 2011 - call for late-breaking topics in high dynamic range imaging
body:
Present your research work on HDRI at Eurographics 2011 in Llandudno, UK.


Deadline - 1 Feb.
Submission format: 2-page extended abstract.
More details: http://eg2011.bangor.ac.uk/calls/areas.html#hdrilb




Rafal Mantiuk
Erik Reinhard
EG 2010 HDR Area Chairs
___
